00029 #ifndef REGRESSIONCHECK_H
00030 #define REGRESSIONCHECK_H
00031 
00032 #include "util/Util.h"
00033 #include "util/Verbose.h"
00034 //
00035 #include "portability/affy-base-types.h"
00036 //
00037 #include <cstring>
00038 #include <string>
00039 //
00040 
00045 class RegressionCheck {
00046 
00047 public:
00048  
00050   RegressionCheck() : m_Name("test"), m_NegTest(false), m_MaxErrorsReport(30), m_CurrentErrorsReported(0)
00051   { }
00052 
00054   virtual ~RegressionCheck() {}
00055 
00061   virtual bool check(std::string &msg) = 0;
00062 
00063 protected:
00072   bool checkMsg(bool condition, const std::string &msg, std::string &summary) {
00073     if(!condition) {
00074       summary += msg;
00075       reportError(msg);
00076     }
00077     return condition;
00078   }
00079 
00085   void reportError(const std::string &err) {
00086     if(m_CurrentErrorsReported++ < m_MaxErrorsReport) {
00087       Verbose::out(1, "Error encountered: " + err);
00088       if(m_CurrentErrorsReported >= m_MaxErrorsReport) {
00089         Verbose::out(1, "Maximum number of errors reported.");
00090       }
00091     }
00092   }
00093 
00099   void setMaxError(int max) {
00100     m_MaxErrorsReport = max;
00101   }
00102 
00113   void checkFloat(float gold, float gen, double eps, bool &success, double &maxDiff, bool log = false) {
00114 
00115           if (!Util::isFinite(gold) && !Util::isFinite(gen)) {return;}
00116       if(!Util::isFinite(gold) || !Util::isFinite(gen)) {
00117         // Allow for case where both inf to not be an error
00118         if(gold == gen)
00119             return;
00120         success = false;
00121         if(log)
00122             reportError("Non-finite floats. gold: '" + ToStr(gold) + "' test: '" + ToStr(gen) + "'");
00123         return;
00124       }
00125       
00126       double diff = fabs(gold - gen);
00127       maxDiff = Max(diff, maxDiff);
00128       if(diff > eps) {
00129         success = false;
00130         if(log)
00131             reportError("Different floats. gold: '" + ToStr(gold) + "' test: '" + ToStr(gen) + "'");
00132         return;
00133       }
00134   }
00135  
00136 public:
00137   std::string m_Name;
00138   bool m_NegTest;
00139 
00140 private:
00141 
00142   int m_MaxErrorsReport;        
00143   int m_CurrentErrorsReported;  
00144 
00145 };

00148 #endif /* REGRESSIONCHECK_H */
